thread.title: Great value and location in London
thread.title_full: Great value and location in London - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah M
title: Great value and location in London
text:
What a fab location ! Right in Leicester square with lovely views of all the main sights !! Would b great for kids as its right beside a Nickelodeon and Lego store !! Also right b side the odeon cinema !
Perfect location excellent staff
We will b back
